abstract: Phoenix Federal District Court jury finds that Hildale, Utah, and Colorado City, Ariz--neighboring towns run by Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints--violated nonbelievers' rights.
lead_paragraph: Towns in Arizona and Utah run by the sect controlled by Warren Jeffs discriminated against outsiders in housing permits, policing and utility hookups.

headline.main: Towns Run by Polygamist Sect Violated Rights of Others, Jury Finds
headline.print_headline: Polygamist-Run Towns Violated Rights of Others, Jury Finds

snippet: Towns in Arizona and Utah run by the sect controlled by Warren Jeffs discriminated against outsiders in housing permits, policing and utility hookups.
